title: Stunning Five-Star Jiuzhaigou National Park Escape
description: Escape to the ethereal beauty of Jiuzhaigou National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Resort Jiuzhai Paradise, an IHG Hotel. Hidden within the enchanting Jiuzhaigou Forest, the hotel is housed within a steel-and-glass structure and embellished with inspirations from the local Tibetan and Qiang cultures. Immerse yourself in the beauty of the natural surroundings before retreating to the lavish spa, mouthwatering eateries and soothing pool.
location_description: InterContinental Resort Jiuzhai Paradise, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ganhaizi, Zhangzha Town, Jiuzhaigou, Sichuan, 623402, Mainland China
